00107                                                                                 $Order = false , $Condition = false )
00108             {
00109                   try
00110                   {
00111                         $Login = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_login();

00114                               $this->PmsgAccess->select(

00266             function                delete_message_for_user( $id , $Options )
00267             {
00268                   try
00269                   {
00270                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00271 
00272                         $Login = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_login();
00273                         
00274                         $Messages = $this->PmsgAccess->unsafe_select( "recipient LIKE '$Login' AND id IN ( $id )" );
00275                         
00276                         $id = implode( ',' , get_field_ex( $Messages , 'id' ) );
00277 
00278                         $this->PmsgAccess->update( $id , array( 'deleted' => 1 ) );
00279                   }
00280                   catch( Exception $e )
00281                   {
00282                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00283                   }
00284             }

00308             function                cleanup_message_for_user( $id )
00309             {
00310                   try
00311                   {
00312                         if( is_array( $id ) )
00313                         {
00314                               $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00315                               $id = implode( ' , ' , $id );
00316                         }
00317                         else
00318                         {
00319                               $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00320                         }
00321 
00322                         $Login = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_login();
00323                         
00324                         $Messages = $this->PmsgAccess->unsafe_select( "recipient LIKE '$Login' AND id IN ( $id )" );
00325                         
00326                         $id = implode( ',' , get_field_ex( $Messages , 'id' ) );
00327 
00328                         $this->PmsgAccess->update( $id , array( 'deleted' => 2 ) );
00329                   }
00330                   catch( Exception $e )
00331                   {
00332                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00333                   }
00334             }

00358             function                create( $Record )
00359             {
00360                   try
00361                   {
00362                         $Login = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_login();
00363                         set_field( $Record , 'author' , $Login );
00364                         
00365                         $AllRecipients = $this->Security->get( get_field( $Record , 'recipient' ) , 'string' );
00366                         $AllRecipients = explode( ',' , $AllRecipients );
00367                         
00368                         foreach( $AllRecipients as $k => $Recipient )
00369                         {
00370                               $Recipient = trim( $Recipient , " \t\r\n," );
00371                               if( $Recipient != '' )
00372                               {
00373                                     set_field( $Record , 'recipient' , $Recipient );
00374                                     $this->PmsgAccess->create( $Record );
00375                               }
00376                         }
00377                   }
00378                   catch( Exception $e )
00379                   {
00380                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00381                   }
00382             }

00438             function                get_by_id( $id )
00439             {
00440                   try
00441                   {
00442                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00443                         
00444                         $Records = $this->unsafe_select( $this->NativeTable.".id = $id" );
00445                         
00446                         if( count( $Records ) == 0 )
00447                         {
00448                               throw( new Exception( 'Record was not found' ) );
00449                         }
00450                         
00451                         return( $Records[ 0 ] );
00452                   }
00453                   catch( Exception $e )
00454                   {
00455                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00456                   }

00477             function                set_read( $id )
00478             {
00479                   try
00480                   {
00481                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00482                         $Login = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_login();
00483                         
00484                         $Record = $this->PmsgAccess->unsafe_select( "id = $id AND recipient LIKE '$Login'" );
00485                         if( count( $Record ) > 0 )
00486                         {
00487                               $this->PmsgAccess->update( $id , array( '`read`' => 1 ) );
00488                         }
00489                   }
00490                   catch( Exception $e )
00491                   {
00492                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00493                   }
00494             }
